metadata.title: CVE-2020-7751 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
pathval before version 1.1.1 is vulnerable to prototype pollution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-7751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-pathval - 1.1.0-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-pathval package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.0-4').
